comment: Be aware that not all the settings suggested here could be modified as you like. Read comments on sense2gol_pizero.py and Sense2GoL manuals for more information.

radar-installation.height-from-ground-level-comment: Needs to be measured manually and the valued registered here before starting the radar.

sense2gol.sampling-frequency-Hz-comment: To change this value, Sense2GoL must be reprogrammed. See Sense2GoL manual for more information.
sense2gol.samples-per-frame-comment: To change this value, Sense2GoL must be reprogrammed. See Sense2GoL manual for more information.
sense2gol.adc-resolution-bits-comment: Can't be changed. See Sense2GoL manual for more information.
sense2gol.adc-range-v-comment: Can't be changed. See Sense2GoL manual for more information.
